title: Item Sets in New Client
body: I know in Riot's post about the new client they wouldn't be adding item sets to it because barely anyone used it. I know alot of people learning new champs use it so they don't have to worry about remembering their build. And it's just convenient to have it there. I have a situational area that allows me to choose a defensive item on adc and a Misc. tab for potions, wards, elixirs and sweepers. Please Riot I really think they are a great addition and I don't want to see them go.

replies.body:
_"Barely anyone used it, so lets take it away!"_

Sooooo, shall we take away all the fire escapes too?
It's even funnier because every uses item sets, especially all the pros and those are the only people they care about anyway.
yeah.. bummed to see no item sets in the new client... </3

I play mainly Support/ADC with a little AP top or mid so I have one Item Set that has 5 blocks and covers all champs I play and all situations. I never have to look for what I want, just a quick scroll up or scroll down and everything is there. 

It's going to suck hairy balls when Item Sets disappear for good. 

GG Riot, uncool.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
i use it for all champions i play, some i have 3+ on 1 champion. i think item sets is the best thing

They are in fact looking at bringing item sets into the new client. Confirmed as of now but no ETA.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-Updated-Client-Open-Beta-FAQ#h2q1

I agree, I used them all of the time
It's how I get comfortable with a champion actually.
Every time I use a champion I make sure to have a custom item set for them.

The old client just disappeared today, and on my main account (FalseHope), i had spent a solid 20 mins last night fixing up all of my masteries, runes and item sets, and now it is as if nothing had happened?. I don't want to have to go looking up my builds when i can just have it sitting there, Come on Riot :(

Thanks, 

FalseHope
I actually use this feature a lot so I don't have to fish through all the items because sometimes the recommended items aren't the best. I would hate to see riot take this out of the game.

While i don't use it anymore, it's mostly because it was buggy and wouldn't save, and it was easier to just look through the whole shop, be so much easier if they would just put it in the new client and i would start using the thing again.
